Attacks.Name: Icicle Crash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Alolan Sandslash gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Iron Head
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Alolan Sandslash may push the target character S before damage is dealt.

Attacks.Name: Blizzard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage and gain the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Snow Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters targeting Alolan Sandslash with attacks suffer -1 attack die if they are within Range 3.

Superpowers.Name: Iron Defense
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of its next activation, Alolan Sandslash adds 1 die to its defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Avalanche
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Alolan Sandslash suffer 1 damage. Alolan Sandslash gains 1 power for each character damaged this way.

Attacks.Name: Frostbite Strike
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stun and Incinerate special conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Spinning Slash
Superpowers.Effect: Place Alolan Sandslash within Range 2. After placement, enemy characters within Range 1 suffer 1 damage.
